1445508982311821320.text:
Defining some terms (cont.)
* API First - Requiring that a web interface is the primary (and usually only) way data and functionality is exposed to a wider system
* API Design First- Requiring that the API Design happens entirely before development occurs

1445508980302704642.text:
Defining some terms:
* Digitization: Doing what you do but with greater efficiency and/or automation due to software
* Digital Transformation: Flexibility to realign people, processes, and tech to harness *NEW* emergent opportunities at a rate of change similar to software
